page.title: 14INDUSTRY AND WORK.
page.content: {COMPTON BUILDINGS }are the biggest employers with 140+people;they make concrete garages,home extensions and concrete buildings. Delivery is by lorry nationwide;materials used are cement, sand,gravel. timber,steel,nuts bolts,washers & asbestos roofing.They use 8 computers & 4 printers. {KNIGHTS have a transport firm with 16 lorries &36 employees;they quarry & deliver stone from Wroxton & itney,sand and gravel from Fawsley, and ballast from Banbury & Didcot.{FENNY COMPTON GARAGE on the A423 repair & sell cars; best seller is the Austin Metro ; they sell about 250 cars a year.{FENNY MARINE are on the Oxford Canal,& moor 100+ boats;they have a hire fleet of 20 narrowboats.{NORMAN CONTRACTS }is a Land Drainage firm,a small builder, a craftsman in wood, & a Tyre firm,also aScreenprintin works with 15 employed
